36.heading: Gale, June.
36.title: "Did Rex Tell You About June's Getting Engaged to Ken Baron?"
36.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Melissa thinks the inscrutable Rex is shaken up by the news.

37.heading: Gale, June.
37.title: "His Future is Uncertain"
37.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Ken Baron has M.S., and Brice Adams wants to know if June is sure she should marry him.

38.heading: Gale, June.
38.title: "I Had a Premonition About This Last Night!"
38.author: Wilson and Di Preta.
notes: Summary: Berna Holt calls Melissa to tell her June's having the baby.

39.heading: Gale, June.
39.title: "I'll Go to the Airport with You, June!"
39.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: June tells Ken he should go practice his golf instead, so they kiss goodbye at the hotel.

40.heading: Gale, June.
40.title: "In This Day of Equal Rights, How Come You Never Proposed to Me, Miss Gale?"
40.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Brice says Rex hasn't been himself since Melissa told him about June's engagement, and June says she wants more than being a career girl in an office.

41.heading: Gale, June.
41.title: "Maybe We'll See Each Other Later at the Store"
41.author: Wilson and DiPreta.
notes: Summary: Spiro Timotheus and June Gale say goodbye in the hospital; a patient in a wheelchair and a nurses' station are part of the setting.

42.heading: Gale, June.
42.title: "She Was the Best Nurse for the Job"
42.author: Wilson and DiPreta.
notes: Summary: June and Rex are talking about Becka; meanwhile someone asks to see Mr. Chase, vice-president of the hospital.

43.heading: Gale, June.
43.title: "Yes, We Know Dr. Hanson!"
43.author: Wilson & DiPreta.
notes: Summary: June introduces Nancy Davis and Veronica Hill ("two first-rate nurses") to Becka, and mentions Becka's husband Peter Hanson.
